bibl.title: Anastasius, Justinian, and the Pagans: A Tale of Two Law Codes and a Papyrus.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XV, 1814 [= M.-P.3 2969; LDAB 6324]. - Justinian and his two Code editions. - P. Oxy. XV, 1814. - CJ 1.11: De paganis sacrificiis et templis. - The Code's modern edition and textual transmission. - Anastasius and the pagans. - Justinian and the pagans. - The mysterious rescript to [The?]odotus. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: CORCORAN Simon, Anastasius, Justinian, and the Pagans: A Tale of Two Law Codes and a Papyrus.
Journal of Late Antiquity 2 (2009) pp. 183-208, 1 tabl.
